transcript.text: *breath* I am exhausted
thank you so much for yesterday evening
you made us the best welcome ever
the beginning wasn't perfect
there was a lot of problems, you made us a lot of throwbacks
and thank you for that because it helps us to evolve
the first biggest problem was the sound, it wasn't that good
the second problem was that some peoples told us that it was like a tv show
and i totally understand because it was the first prime ever
and we knew that there would be a lot a people watching us
over 140000 viewers
we had a lot of stress, and didn't know what to do and didn't dare to do things spontaneously like we love to
but don't worry
it was the fist prime in all the others it will become more spontaneous
which means a lot of problems
but it's not a big deal that's what we love on internet
and the third criticism you made is that we didn't introduce the program or the streamers
i didn't introduced the streamers
and i didn't introduced the program and i was supposed to do in the beginning of the show
and it's totally stupid to start with that, or it's just my opinion
so i deleted it and i should have done that
and talked about that and i'm sorry
for those who waited for this and have been disappointed
but we're gonna do one to introduce everyone and the program in 40min
and this show will be replayed on the channel "le stream" the link is in the description
feel free to subscribe
so you can be warned of what there will be on "le stream"
and you decide if you decide pfff i can't talk anymore
so you can project yourselves and find out if a show please you or not
ah and fourth thing and this is for those you are used to watch streams
they wanted us to do more video games but "le prime" is a show
where the goal isn't to play video games or a very few but
for the first we only played on the nintendo switch
but you have to tell yourself that "le prime" is a show of 1hour the Wednesday
but the 6 other days there's billion of gaming streams
so don't worry about that you're gonna see Gotaga and Mika
do head shots and carry on h1z1 and overwatch don't worry about that
and fifth thing the website wich has a lot of bug
and even a lot of things to update especially on the achievements
when you watch 2 hours of a stream it only counts for 20 minutes
it's like pokemon go with the foot steps for the eggs...no? ok
in general in life i'm afraid of beginnig project because it moves me out of my comfort zone
and i'm scared of getting out of my comfort zone like everyone
but here i told myself that it was worth it and there are a lot of friends in it
they all trust me and i all trust them there is no reason it wouldn't work
thank you and i haven't said it enough during the stream because we were
really stressed and all concentrated
it feels good when you feel like "let's go we did the first show and now it's launched"
and i'm going to Japan, yeah i am very tired and I really need vacation
and i'm going this year to Japan with my father and my brother
just with the fam you know
when i came to Japan last year i told myself
"i need to take my father and my brother here they will absolutely love it
it is gonna relax them" and this year i make them this gift
because we all need to relax
and live some things with family, i've never been really to that family side
when we traveled i was kinda forced to
now it's just me wishing to travel with my family
and have fun with them
and create amazing memories
and i found that important... well that was the emotional moment did you enjoy it?
i did
i'm going there tomorrow but don't panic i made some pre recorded videos
i didn't make too many because if i did, some would have sucked
but right now i find that they're all pretty cool you'll see i let the surprise
finally my homies i just wanted to let you this small message before flying for Japan
we'll meet again next week with a vlog
and i'm going to make my baggage
i'm searching something like a suitcase to do like i'm doing it but...
it's a shitty idea
see yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
heyyy Japan, it's pretty cool
Thanks you
